meanings.definition: A person or group that makes tools.
meanings.sent1: The toolmakers in the workshop crafted a new hammer.
meanings.sent2: The toolmakers are skilled at creating useful gadgets.
meanings.sent3: The toolmakers decided to have a competition to see who could make the silliest tool.
meanings.sent4: In the world of creativity, toolmakers are the architects of innovation.
meanings.sent5: The toolmakers' dedication to their craft is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The act or process of making tools.
meanings.sent1: The toolmakers' workshop was filled with the sounds of hammering and sawing.
meanings.sent2: Toolmakers require precision and patience in their work.
meanings.sent3: During the toolmakers' picnic, they played a game where they had to make tools out of food items.
meanings.sent4: The toolmakers' artistry transforms raw materials into essential instruments.
meanings.sent5: The toolmakers' expertise lies in their ability to shape metal and wood into functional tools.
